name: Invasion of Domo IX
description:
Test your ability in this 30's sci-fi inspired matching game.

Match 3 in a row to score. Match multiple 3s to score even more. Can you find other ways to score big?

Compatibility:

Windows - 20 MB ram (not including the OS), 20 MB hard drive (not including the OS), 64 bit OS,  x86 processor, 1280x720 screen.

Linux - Works under Wine. See Windows system requirements.

Legal:

Based on the Orx Game Engine.

Using sounds from ZapSplat!.
